name: Sierra Luxury Room | 1 King
description: Luxury king room in the Sierra Tower featuring premium furnishings, one king-size bed, High Definition TV, in-room safe, high-speed Wi-Fi, refreshment center, mini-refrigerator, and complimentary coffee. Experience the finest standard accommodations at the Eldorado.
shortDescription: Premium luxury king room in the Sierra Tower with top-tier furnishings.

meta.title: Sierra Luxury Room 1 King – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Sierra Luxury King Room at Eldorado Resort Reno – premium accommodations in the Sierra Tower.

testimonials.quote: Visited Sierra Luxury Room | 1 King during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Derek A.

testimonials.quote: Sierra Luxury Room | 1 King was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Paul D.
